pages.text: The $(mob)Wizard Harpy$() is a flying monster that spawns in Roofed Forests in the $(thing)Overworld$(). All $(mob)Wizard Harpies$() spawn with a $(item)Magic Book$(), and attack players using magic projectiles which inflict a random effect based upon the $(item)Magic Book$() they are spawned with. $(mob)Wizard Harpies$() are immune to falling damage. When a $(mob)Wizard Harpy$() is reduced to 25% health or lower, it may flee combat entirely.
$(mob)Wizard Harpies$() drop $(item)Soul Fire$() on death. These are an excellent source of fuel and burn for 580 seconds. Can also be used like $(item)Flint and Steel$() to start fires.
$(mob)Wizard Harpies$() rarely drop $(item)Book of Memory$() which can be used to gain 10 experience levels.
